body.name: Movo VXR10 Universal Shotgun Mic for Camera - Camera Microphone for DSLR, iPhone and Android Smartphones - Compatible with Canon EOS, Nikon, and Sony Cameras - with Shock Mount, Deadcat Windscreen
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 12 hrs 55 mins

Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 14 hrs 10 mins
features: UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: External microphone for iPhone, Androids, Cameras, Camcorders, Audio Recorders, Tablets, and Laptops. Use as iPhone microphone, DSLR microphone or camera mic.
PROFESSIONAL MOVO MIC: The durable aluminum construction and battery-free design includes a sturdy integrated shock mount to minimize handling noise.

1-YEAR WARRANTY: We’ve got your back. Our products are designed to ease your technical woes, not add to them. Our friendly US-Based support is here to help - NOTE: To reduce hiss when using the mic on a DSLR camera, we recommend using manual audio levels, accessible from your camera’s menu.
CREATE: Essential compact shotgun microphone for recording YouTube Vlogs, Tik Tok, interviews, family vacation trips, live music, outdoor events, tutorials.
INCLUDES: Furry "Deadcat" Windscreen, Soft Carrying Case, 3.5mm TRS Output Cable (For DSLR Cameras, Camcorders, Recorders), 3.5mm TRRS Output Cable (For Smartphones, Tablets, and Mac).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality VLOG microphone setup w/ cables THRIFTY PRICE
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If this review helps in any way Positive or Negative Please hit HELPFUL!!! It will help encourage me to continue my real reviews of products I've purchased.Likes: * Thrifty Price * Nice volume * Complete for VLOG * Dead cat works well well to cut out wind noise * Detailed instructions on how to mount microphone * Cables for both smartphone and camera hookup included * If you register within a month of your order your one year warranty is extended to two years total.Dislikes: * Microphone will not work with standard smartphone with case on. 9MM base to 3/5MM plug is blocked by phone case and will not fully insert to phone. At first I thought the microphone did not work and almost knocked off a star as I've had to cut my phone case in order use this microphone with my phone in its case.Yes I'd buy this again. You can tell I'm new to this dead cat thing as you can clearly see mine in the upper corner of my quick video review.Thank you for reading my review:Again Please give this review a thumbs up. It is real. I do answer questions if in comments. I've been on Amazon as a customer for over twenty years, and now a top 500 reviewer. I don't get compensated for my reviews. (Not that I wouldn't like to be.) I pay for Amazon Prime so I get any of the perks that come with my Prime membership.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best MIC!
reviews.reviewText: The Movo VXR10 Universal Shotgun Mic for Camera is a game-changer for anyone looking to elevate their audio game in videography. Compatible with DSLRs, iPhones, and Android smartphones, this shotgun microphone delivers crisp and clear sound, enhancing the overall quality of my recordings. The shock mount and deadcat windscreen are invaluable additions, minimizing unwanted noise and ensuring my audio remains top-notch even in challenging conditions. Whether I'm using it with my Canon EOS, Nikon, or Sony camera, the Movo VXR10 proves to be a versatile and reliable companion for capturing professional-grade audio. If you're serious about upgrading your audio setup, this microphone is a must-have for content creators and videographers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Versatility, Slight Audio Hiccup
reviews.reviewText: This shotgun mic had some real high points that earned it a solid four stars from me. First off, the inclusion of two separate cables, one for cameras and one for smartphones, is a major win. No more fumbling around with adapters or searching for the right connector – it's all there in the box. Plus, the two stands – one large and one small – give you flexibility depending on your filming setup. Whether you're shooting a big production or a quick phone video, this mic has you covered.Now, onto the audio quality. Here's where things get a little tricky. My recordings with this mic sounded good, clear, and focused. But... I honestly couldn't tell a huge difference in audio quality compared to other similar mics I've used. Maybe it's just the nature of these shotgun mics, but I was hoping for a bit more of a noticeable improvement. Don't get me wrong, the audio is clean and usable, but I wasn't blown away by a night-and-day difference.Overall, this mic is a solid choice for its versatility and user-friendliness. The dual cables and stands are a huge convenience, and the audio quality is definitely good. However, if you're chasing that game-changing audio leap, you might want to keep exploring your options.Pros:Two connecting cables for both cameras and smartphonesTwo stands of different sizes for varied setupsClear and focused audioCons:Audio improvement compared to other mics wasn't significantFinal Verdict: 4 out of 5 stars – A versatile and user-friendly mic with good audio, but slightly underwhelming in terms of noticeable audio enhancement.I hope this review helps you decide if this shotgun mic is the right fit for your needs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4 years and still going..
reviews.reviewText: Bought this back in 2020 and still using the same mic in 2024. It’s a great little mic and love the price. Its been used A LOT. The bracket is crap so just plan on getting a few extra of those. Besides that, definitely 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly with my Sony ZV-1F
Não entrega muita qualidade de áudio. Não senti muita diferença do audio desse microfone para o microfone da câmera.

This microphone is pretty great for how much it was. I have been using it for my Youtube videos and I haven't had any problems with it.It's great as it doesn't require a battery. As soon as it's plugged into a camera or a phone, it connects right away.It's not going to give you the best sounding microphone but it is very good compared to other mics around this price range.One of the mic shock mount broke in the middle so I contacted MOVO customer service and they were able to send me replacement shock mount.Looks like their customer service is great too!

reviews.reviewTitle: Poor Quality and No service support for online purchase
reviews.reviewText: The Mic gave way in less than 6 months of use. Upon contacting the organisation I was informed that for online purchase there is no warranty. Also the price I paid here was higher than company website

Un ottimo acquisto per registrare video con un audio decente. La copertura pelosina garantisce una buona qualità in caso di vento. E' venduto con due cavetti, uno per essere collegato al microfono della videocamera, una per un utilizzo su smartphone. Lo porto sempre in viaggio in me, è compatto e molto leggero e si monta velocemente. Ha una piccola slitta che consente di essere agganciata alla piastra del flash a slitta o se si preferisce su un treppiede piccolino.
